Name: Kallimarmaro
Description: A historical neighborhood known for the Panathenaic Stadium, the site of the first modern Olympic Games.

Name: Pagrati
Description: A lively residential neighborhood with a mix of traditional Greek culture and modern amenities, offering cafes, restaurants, and green spaces.

Name: Exarchia
Description: A famous district known for its vibrant street art, alternative culture, and activism, attracting both locals and tourists.

Name: Kolonaki
Description: An upscale neighborhood known for its high-end shops, cafes, and cultural institutions like the Benaki Museum.

Name: Lycabettus
Description: A scenic hill neighborhood that offers breathtaking views of Athens, a popular spot for both locals and tourists.
